content.raw:
Nate,
If you do decide to use this brick box in the VRC worlds (or something like it) please remember to duplicate it and add different textures as perfectly identical textures will likely destroy vision algorithms which would work just fine with real imagery.
content.html: Nate, If you do decide to use this brick box in the VRC worlds (or something like it) please remember to duplicate it and add different textures as perfectly identical textures will likely destroy vision algorithms which would work just fine with real imagery.
